subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: General Electric extended its global Olympic sponsorship through 2020, adding an estimated $200 million sweetener to the $2 billion it paid for NBC to carry the 2008, ’10 and ’12 Games.
snippet: General Electric extended its global Olympic sponsorship through 2020, adding an estimated $200 million sweetener to the $2 billion it paid for NBC to carry the 2008, ’10 and ’12 Games.
